name: THE OTHER NIGHHHT
description:
THE OTHER NIGHHHT

This game was realised by a team of teachers during the jam organised by the school LISAA.

Story:

Controls(Keyboard):

  • Z: Jump
  • E: Cast spell
  • A: Discard Spell

Controls(Gamepad):

  • A: Jump
  • RB/RT: Cast spell
  • LB/LT: Discard Spell

Team Members:
